review: Works good set up is confusing

review: the only thing I don't like is that it needs its own power supply.
author: Melanie

review: Works great, having a lot of fun downloading movies from Amazon etc.
author: Linda Schafer

review: Overall I like it a lot. Amazon has found a variety of ways to nudge you toward its shows and movies even if you have to pay for them through Amazon and they're freely available through one of your other services like Netflix or Hulu. Other than that, I'd say it's a very slight upgrade from Roku.
author: Paul Gorski

review: It is much more than I expected and am looking forward to cancelling my Dish subscription!
author: Kathy Morris

review: Omg I LOVE the stick! We used our wii and Xbox in past to watch tv apps then tried chrome.. That was ehh can only use your phone, then we got rokus for remote and I like but This is even better!! Love it! I got prime promo when it came out $19 so I bought 2 and I wish I bought more love!
author: Bargain Betty "bargainBetty"

review: no way to reduce bandwidth like my roku box ,cant use on my slow country dsl but can use the roku

review: I love it.  It is quicker that what came with my tv.  Love the apps and such.  I only wish it did Vudu.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Fabulous. You get your moneys' worth.
